Skills.Name: Super Shield
Skills.Description: <code=200,param=115><color=#3398f1>Shields</color> DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of skill user's ATK) of all Green Elemental allies for 15s. Further recovers SP by <color=red>{1}</color> if Seven Shadows.
Skills.ShortDescription: Shields DMG of all Green Elemental allies, recovers SP if Seven Shadows

Skills.Name: Magic Sword Act
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>{0}%</color> DMG on single enemy with highest ATK. Further lowers ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 7s.
Skills.ShortDescription:
Inflicts DMG, lowers ATK of
single enemy

Skills.Name: Dessert Disaster
Skills.Description: <code=200,param=115><color=#3398f1>Shields</color> DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of skill user's ATK) of all allies for 15s. Further raises ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 15s if Seven Shadows. Recovers own HP by <color=red>{2}%</color> of ATK.
Skills.ShortDescription: Shields DMG of all allies, raises ATK if Seven Shadows. Recovers own HP

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Reduces DMG Received for all allies by <color=red>5.00%-40.00%</color> for 5s according to Combo Bonus. Inflicts 100.00% DMG.
Skills.ShortDescription: Reduces DMG Received for all allies, inflicts DMG on single enemy

Skills.Name: Be My Guest!
Skills.Description: Each time Buff is received, <code=200,param=115><color=#3398f1>shields</color> DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of skill user's ATK) of single ally with lowest HP for 15s. (CT 3s)
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time Buff is received, shields DMG of single ally

Skills.ShortDescription: Shields DMG of all Green Elemental allies, recovers SP if Seven Shadows

Skills.Name: Be My Guest!: Gamma Only
Skills.Description: At start of Wave, lowers DMG Inflicted for Yellow Elemental enemies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 20s
Skills.ShortDescription: At start of Wave, lowers DMG Inflicted for Yellow Elemental enemies

Skills.Name: Be My Guest!: Gamma Only
Skills.Description: When Hidden Technique is activated, lowers DEF of all enemies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 20s. Further lowers CRIT DEF by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 20s. Raises ATK of all allies by <color=red>{2}%</color> for 20s.
